original_text: That is because the Lord your God is very kind. So he will not leave you alone. He will never destroy you. He will never forget the covenant that he made with your ancestors. That was a serious promise that he made to them.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와는 자비하신 하나님이심이라 그가 너를 버리지 아니하시며 너를 멸하지 아니하시며 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 잊지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: That is because the Lord your God is very kind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너의 하나님 여호와가 매우 자비롭기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: So he will not leave you alone.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 너를 혼자 두지 않으실 것이다.
그는 결코 너를 멸하지 않으실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will never forget the covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 결코 언약을 잊지 않으실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: that he made with your ancestors.
